meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Duncan Stewart Christine Varnado Tom Kunzen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6110.

td.p: Duncan Stewart, a research director from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Christine Varnado, a graduate instructor and Ph.D. student originally from Hattiesburg, Mississippi
Tom Kunzen, a geotechnical engineer from Orlando, Florida (whose 3-day cash winnings total $92,001)

tr.td: CLASSIC MOVIE TRAILERS
A BITTER / SWEET SYMPHONY
BAD FORTUNE COOKIES
WHICH DIRECTION ARE YOU HEADED?
(Alex: ...of the four basic directions.)
"K" AS IN...

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This race was held for the first time in May with Ray Harroun winning with an average speed of about 75 mph')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This race was held for the first time in May with Ray Harroun winning with an average speed of about 75 mph

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Duncan\'s response] Yes, 46 and 44 years of age.)
DuncanWho are Clinton and Gore?
$3,601
ChristineWho were Bill Clinton & Al Gore
$3,805
TomWho are Obama & Biden?
$4,000
Bill Clinton & Al Gore')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'With a combined age of just 90 years, this president & vice president were the youngest team ever inaugurated')

tr.td: THE PRESIDENCY
With a combined age of just 90 years, this president & vice president were the youngest team ever inaugurated
Tom
Christine
Duncan
4-day champion: $110,601
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Tom
Christine
Duncan

30 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
